bill.summary:
School Security Enhancement Act
This bill amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow local educational agencies to use specified portions of Student Support and Academic Enrichment grants for planning and designing school buildings and facilities, installing infrastructure, and implementing other measures to strengthen security on school premises.
